mapper.select: SELECT user_id, repu_type_cd, repu_type_nm, tot_repu_star_cnt, tot_cnt, avr_star_cnt, cre_dt, cre_id, upd_dt, upd_id FROM whale_tot_repu;
select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, a.repu_type_nm, b.user_nm, b.thumbnail from whale_tot_repu a, whale_user b, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.repu_type_cd = '01';
